Text:
Thanks for the great uploads and giving us oppurtunity to watch movies which are history. I have downloaded most of your classics. I know you donot take request. I just wanted to bring into you attention that two great westerns need your magical touch, they are out in blu-ray now:
1. Once Upon a Time in the West (C'era una volta il West 1969)
2. Once Upon a Time in America  (1984)

Please consider this request from India. Thanks in anticipation.
